trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around August 6th 2010
Summary: Bright orange fireball glow in clouds.
divs: sighting detailslooked out of window above the stairs in my house and seen a bright orange light like a fire ball dancing\flashing for around 25-50 seconds then disappeared followed by one or two small flashes was very bright tho really stood out in the sky very thick cloud to night too never seen anything like it before anyone know what it was?
